Eligible: Graduation with 3–6 years of experience in Promo Editing (Media or Non-Media background)
job_summary: Responsible for understanding creative briefs from the OAP team to edit and produce high-quality channel promos. The role involves driving innovation, ideation, execution excellence, and stakeholder management to deliver impactful promotional content aligned with business goals.
Note: Role requires balancing innovation and efficiency while adhering to broadcast parameters and channel standards.
mandatory: Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and 3–6 years of promo editing experience.
skills_expected: Understand briefs from the OAP team for channel promos and execute accordingly.
Enhance promo creatives with innovative ideas, scripting, and proper execution.
Deliver high-quality edits conforming to channel audio and video standards.
Maintain balance between quality and quantity while ensuring productivity benchmarks are met.
Ensure zero disruption on air with adherence to QC/TC standards.
Demonstrate proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and basic knowledge of After Effects, Photoshop, Flame, and ProTools.
Deliver creative scripts and promo ideas regularly, with at least 2 new concepts each month.
Engage and collaborate effectively with internal stakeholders – Programming, OAP, Digital Archiving, TC & Capsuling.
Contribute to automation processes, implement improvements, and participate in new creative processes.
Work closely with internal and external teams in a high-paced creative environment.
